Description: Example 1
INPUT
{
  message: {
  switch_1: 'open',
  switch_2: 'close',
  switch_3: 'close',
  switch_1_change: 'yes',
  switch_2_change: 'no',
  switch_3_change: 'no'
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  'status:0': { unitId: 'state', record: true, nature: 'Switch 1 open' },
  'status:1': { unitId: 'state', record: false, nature: 'Switch 2 close' },
  'status:2': { unitId: 'state', record: false, nature: 'Switch 3 close' },
  'status:3': { unitId: 'state', record: true, nature: 'switch 1 change' },
  'status:4': { unitId: 'state', record: false, nature: 'Switch 2 not change' },
  'status:5': { unitId: 'state', record: false, nature: 'Switch 3 not change' }
}
